rooms.description: Spacious entrance with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows and Vastu compliant positioning.
Art Deco styled living area featuring modern design elements, geometric patterns, and high ceilings for optimal ventilation.
Elegant dining space integrated with the living room, designed to foster natural light and a sense of openness.
Modern kitchen with ample counter space, ventilation hood, and Vastu-aligned placement for efficient workflow. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide natural lighting.
Accommodates joint family guests with Art Deco finishes, built-in storage, and plenty of windows to promote cross ventilation.
Functional space for laundry and other household chores, designed to ensure efficient movement and natural light.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in living room, kitchen, and guest room to enhance natural light and ventilation.
Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles, providing ease of movement.
Dedicated two-car garage with easy access to the house, integrated into overall layout while respecting Art Deco aesthetics.

rooms.description: Spacious and well-ventilated master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Art Deco details such as geometric patterns and elegant furnishings are incorporated.
Additional bedroom designed for joint family members, with a focus on natural ventilation and Vastu-compliant orientation.
Well-appointed bathroom with modern fixtures, ensuring privacy while integrating natural light where possible.
Functional storage integrated into the master bedroom, designed for convenience and adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in bedrooms ensure maximum natural light and ventilation.
Open balcony space for fresh air, designed to align with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
